items.question: What is Guide of Dubai?
items.answer: Guide of Dubai is a comprehensive travel guide designed to help you discover the best experiences in Dubai. You can find tours, activities, hotel reservations, and more on a single platform.

items.question: Can I customize the tour?
items.answer: Yes! We can create customized tour packages for you. Once you specify your interests, budget, and preferences, we prepare the most suitable tour for you.

items.question: What is included in a Desert Safari?
items.answer: Our desert safari includes camel riding, sandboarding, traditional costume photos, BBQ dinner, belly dance show, and round-trip transfer services.

items.question: Are Burj Khalifa tickets included in the tour?
items.answer: Burj Khalifa tickets vary by tour package. They are included in some city tours, while in others, they can be added for an additional fee.

items.question: Can I book private tours?
items.answer: Of course! We organize private group tours. You can have a completely personal experience with your own guide, vehicle, and itinerary.

items.question: Is the Museum of the Future included in your city tours?
items.answer: Museum of the Future is included in our premium city tour packages. It can be added to standard tours for an extra fee.

items.question: What are the safety measures for Desert Safari?
items.answer: All our vehicles are licensed, our drivers are experienced, and safety equipment is fully equipped. We conduct all our activities within the scope of insurance coverage.

items.question: How can I book a tour with Guide of Dubai?
items.answer: You can book online from our website, contact us via our WhatsApp line, or call our customer service. You can securely make the payment with a credit card.

items.question: Is transportation included in the tours?
items.answer: Most of our tours include hotel transfers. We provide free transfers from central areas such as Dubai Marina, JBR, and Downtown Dubai.

items.question: How can I contact customer service for my inquiries?
items.answer: You can reach us via our 24/7 WhatsApp line (+971 xx xxx xxxx), email (info@guideofdubai.com), or phone. Our live support on our website is also active.

items.question: How long does the Dubai City Tour take?
items.answer: The Dubai City Tour lasts approximately 8-10 hours. It starts at 9:00 AM and ends between 6:00-7:00 PM.

items.question: Can I get a refund if I cancel my tour?
items.answer: You have the right to cancel for free up to 24 hours in advance. After 24 hours, a 50% deduction is applied. Cancellations due to weather conditions are refunded 100%.

items.question: Do I need a visa to visit Dubai?
items.answer: Turkish citizens can stay up to 90 days without a visa. For other countries, we offer visa consultancy services.

items.question: Can I visit Miracle Garden year-round?
items.answer: Miracle Garden is only open during the winter months (November-April). It is closed during the summer months (May-October) for maintenance.

subscription.title: Subscribe to Guide of Dubai to stay informed about discounts, campaigns and travel tips!
